Summary



Vedanta to close all mining operations in Goa from March 16, 2018.Marathon Nextgen board approves stock split.Canara Bank to raise up to Rs 1,000 crore via QIP, rights, preferential issue of shares.Petronet LNG Q3 net profit down 10 percent to Rs 529 crore.BPCL, HPCL, M&M, ONGC, SBI and Tata Steel will announce their December quarter earnings today.






Asian stocks fell Friday following a plunge in their U.S. counterparts as the dread that gripped equity markets earlier in the week re-emerged, amid concern rising interest rates will drag down economic growth.The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of NSE Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, fell nearly 2 percent to 10,364 as of 7:00 a.m.
title: Stocks To Watch: Marathon Nextgen, M&M;, ONGC, SBI, Vedanta
